upgrade.itemupgrader.turtle_shell.descri: Wield the Power of the Turtle!
upgrade.itemupgrader.lingering_vision.de: Your eyes retain their vision from the light within the dark.
upgrade.itemupgrader.head_shield.descrip: Protect your head from kinetic impact!
upgrade.itemupgrader.heavy_armor.descrip: Resist incoming attacks at the cost of your speed.
upgrade.itemupgrader.reality_anchor.desc: Defend against otherworldly armor-piercing magical attacks!
upgrade.itemupgrader.sturdy_legs.descrip: Hold your ground against any threat!
Warning: A lack of any knockback may have consequences
upgrade.itemupgrader.magnetic.descriptio: Attract nearby items and experience from far away!
upgrade.itemupgrader.dolphins_gift.descr: Grants the gift of movement to those who swim like the dolphin.
You must surface every 4 seconds to maintain your speed.
upgrade.itemupgrader.nimble_landing.desc: Fall damage becomes hunger damage, make sure you carry food!
Doesn't work when below 3 whole hunger bars.
upgrade.itemupgrader.obsidian_shield.des: Protects the Wielder from Flames temporarily.
upgrade.itemupgrader.dual_wield.descript: Attack significantly faster, but at what cost?
upgrade.itemupgrader.sharpened.descripti: Slice through your foes with a sharpened blade.
upgrade.itemupgrader.polished.descriptio: A polished blade cuts faster and extracts more loot.
upgrade.itemupgrader.efficient.descripti: Dig through blocks with an increased mining speed.
upgrade.itemupgrader.fortunate.descripti: Grants your tool the blessing of the mine.
upgrade.itemupgrader.dwarven.description: Burrow underground, smashing through stone and deepslate.
upgrade.itemupgrader.void_totem.descript: Saves you from dying in the void, but only once.
tooltip.itemupgrader.void_totem.effect: When taking void damage, gain Levitation and Feather Falling temporarily
upgrade.itemupgrader.recall_totem.descri: Teleports you to your spawnpoint when triggered.
upgrade.itemupgrader.wormhole_totem.desc: Allows you to save and load one location.
Can be reset with sneak+left click
upgrade.itemupgrader.creeper_totem.descr: When triggered, a large explosion occurs.
upgrade.itemupgrader.dragon_totem.descri: Channel the fury of the dragon!
Gain a temporary boost in strength to fight back!
upgrade.itemupgrader.recall.description: Teleports you back to your spawn point.
upgrade.itemupgrader.wayfinder.descripti: Teleports you back to your death location.
upgrade.itemupgrader.time_teller.descrip: Tells you the current day and time.
upgrade.itemupgrader.accelerator.descrip: Allows you to mess with time itself.
